pages.text: $(li)The Mud Bricks can be used to craft Mud Bricks and a Slabfish Effigy.$(br)$(li)You can throw them to your enemies right clicking while you have a Mud Brick on your hand.

$(li)They will inflict half of heart of damage and will push your enemies away too.$(br)$(li)You can obtain Bricks smelting Mud in a Furnace, or Kiln.$(br)$(li)Ceramist will trade this item in exchange of Emerals too.$(br)$(li)Their throw range is the largest compared to the Nether Brick (Lowest) and Brick (Middle).
